Here are a few benefits of downloading love text app onto your iPhone-â¢	Love quotes appears randomlyâ¢	Over 500 love text and love poemsâ¢	Nice interfaceâ¢	Send Message via email, SMS, or can copy them to the clipboardâ¢	Share them on facebook & TwitterHow Does Love Quotes App Work?Once you download love quotes app, you will be exposed to a wide array of love text, love poem and love story. reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: A great app to tell your loved one the way u feel about them I use it all the time for my husband :-D
